question: Name two ancient districts separated by Gravina in Matera, Italy.
asked_question_translated: Nombra dos antiguos distritos separados por Gravina en Matera, Italia.
answer: Los dos antiguos distritos separados por Gravina en Matera, Italia, son Sassi Caveoso y Sassi Barisano.
answer_translated_eng: The two former districts separated by Gravina in Matera, Italy, are Sassi Caveoso and Sassi Barisano.
